tooltip.berserksandbosses.raw_raptor_dru: Raw Meat of a Flesh Raptor... Now with a chance of Cardiovascular Disease!
tooltip.berserksandbosses.cooked_raptor_: Cooked Meat of a Flesh Raptor... Tastes like Chicken!
tooltip.berserksandbosses.sasquash: A Sasquash from a member of the Sasquatch Family... Sassy...
tooltip.berserksandbosses.cooked_crimsad: The Cooked Meat of a Crimsader... This is the best meat known to man...
tooltip.berserksandbosses.raw_crimsader_: The Raw Meat of a Crimsader… It somehow tastes good raw…?
tooltip.berserksandbosses.crimsader_scal: The Scale-Plating of a Crimsader… A gentle but violent metal from another world...
tooltip.berserksandbosses.sandy_bloodbon: The bone of a Barren Bonerott... It feels very crusty...
tooltip.berserksandbosses.frosty_bloodbo: The Bone of a Frigid Bonerott... Someone spilt ketchup on it...
tooltip.berserksandbosses.bloodumbra_eye: The eye of a Bloodumbra... It appears to be looking at you funny...
tooltip.berserksandbosses.spacefracture_: A Spacefracture Shuriken... The cooler Ender Pearl...
tooltip.berserksandbosses.tectonic_medai:
A very strange medallion 
The design comes from before the Dawn Era...
